params.name: options.startType
params.description: Either "open" or "closed". Use constants KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN and KeyRange::TYPE_CLOSED for guaranteed correctness. Defaults to KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN.

params.name: options.start
params.description: The key with which to start the range.

params.name: options.endType
params.description: Either "open" or "closed". Use constants KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN and KeyRange::TYPE_CLOSED for guaranteed correctness. Defaults to KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN.

params.name: options.end
params.description: The key with which to end the range.

methods.name: prefixMatch
methods.description:
Returns a key range that covers all keys where the first components match.

Equivalent to calling KeyRange::__construct() with closed type for start and end, and the same key for the start and end.

params.name: type
params.description: Either "open" or "closed". Use constants KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN and KeyRange::TYPE_CLOSED for guaranteed correctness.

params.name: type
params.description: Either "open" or "closed". Use constants KeyRange::TYPE_OPEN and KeyRange::TYPE_CLOSED for guaranteed correctness.
